meta.title: My Crypto Heroes
meta.description: My Crypto Heroes (MCH) is a workerplacement RPG. You will gather and train historical heroes in the actual world while obtaining a number of extensions, in order to conquer the Crypto World.

top.leadMessage: All the time and passion you invest into the game will turn into real assets here.
top.signIn: If you play {type} with your {message}, you can't use same account. Are you sure to log in?
top.signInWarning: * To play all contents of My Crypto Heroes you need a wallet app. Please check the FAQ for details.

referral.description:
Share your link and you will receive GUM!
The reward will be 20% of ETH people who use your link spent. This works only when your referred users use ETH in MCH.
referral.shareText: #MyCryptoHeroes That is the world where all the time and passion you invest into the game will turn into real assets. ‪Join Japanese authentic “blockchain RPG” which can be played without cryptocurrency, and even wallets!!‬

approve.description: To use your heroes, transfer to Crypto World. Before that, you need transfer preparation.
approve.extensiondescription: To use your extensions, transfer to Crypto World. Before that, you need transfer preparation

heroId.withdrawWarning: It will cost 40 GUM for transferring it to Ethereum network. Is it ok?

warning.title: Art edit rules and notes on beta battle
list: You can do Art-edit as much as you want for a hero, but you need to pay 40 GUM (Game Users Money) from the second time.
You can set back to the default art. However skills and growth tendency of parameters will be remained.
Images exactly the same as those registered in Art-edit in the past can not be used in Art-edit.
Do not use pictures that infringe copyright or images that are against public order and morality.
Attention on using Art-edit is stated in Article 11 of the following terms of service.
We guarantee that you own copyright of art that you registered with Art-edit.
We will use the registered art only for MCH game and promotional use.
Images uploaded with Art-edit are managed decentralizedly using IPFS which is a distributed file system.
For edited images, only the display in MCH is changed. On external services such as opensea, the initial image is displayed even after editing.
warning.cost: You need to pay 40 GUM (Game Users Money) from the second time. Is it OK?

loading.body: If it takes more than 30 sec, please reload the page.

info.inRankingTerm:
Beta Battle Ranked Match has started!
We will decide the ranking based on the result of the battle which ended by UTC Oct.21 sun 6:00.
Please check the link below for details.
info.rankHow: Defeat the team with this mark and rank up!
info.inAggregatingTerm:
Beta Battle Ranked Match has finished.
The ranking is being confirmed with the result of the battle which had ended at UTC Oct.21 sun 6:00.
The ranking will be announced at UTC Oct.22 mon 6:00.
info.afterAggregatingTerm:
Beta Battle Ranked Match has finished.
Please check the link below for the ranking result of UTC Oct.22 mon 6:00.
info.newRule: One minute interval between each battle will be introduced from 1 hour before the end of ranked match. For details.

node.warning: Up to 100 quests can be played per day.

shop.wallet: You need to install Ethereum Wallet to buy GUM

closeWarning.text: You have an unfinished quest. Do you want to continue where you left off?

walletModal.1: Access the official METAMASK site from the link below and install METAMASK on your browser.
walletModal.2: After the installation is complete, create a wallet and access MCH!
walletModal.3: For more details on how to use METAMASK
